title: Snowplow
description: Snowplow is the global leader in customer data infrastructure (CDI) for AI, enabling every organization to own and unlock the value of its customer behavioral data to fuel AI-driven marketing, digital products and services, customer experiences, and fraud mitigation. Companies like Burberry, Strava, Auto Trader, and DPG Media use Snowplow to collect and manage real-time, structured and unstructured behavioral data governed in their cloud data platform.
